title: SkogAI Memory Server
content: A memory server hosted at memory.skogai.se that provides persistent memory capabilities to agents through the MCP (Model Context Protocol). This HTTP-based service allows agents to store and retrieve memories across sessions, serving as the central memory infrastructure for the SkogAI ecosystem.
summary: Remote memory system accessible via HTTP MCP protocol

relationships.description: The SkogAI Memory Server is an instance of the MCP Server Configuration pattern, implementing HTTP MCP protocol for remote memory access.
